PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: We process your contact data only for responding to inquiries, project evaluation, and service communication.

data.title: Data we collect
data.text: Name, work email, company details, and project information submitted through the contact form.

payment.title: Payments
payment.text: Payment schedules are milestone-based unless a retainer agreement is active.

liability.title: Liability
liability.text: HiAgent is not liable for third-party platform outages or client-side misuse of deployed systems.
